question: つかえる
sourceAnswer:
<tag><ja>閊える</ja></tag>:: to: {stick/get-stuck/get-caught/get-jammed/clog} | be-{unavailable/busy/occupied/full} | be-piled-up-(e.g.-of-work) | {halt-(in-one's-speech)/stumble-(over-one's-words)/stutter/stammer} | {feel-blocked-(of-one's-chest-or-throat,-due-to-grief,-anxiety,-illness,-etc.)/feel-pressure/feel-pain}
<tag><ja>痞える</ja></tag>:: to: feel-blocked-(of-one's-chest-or-throat,-due-to-grief,-anxiety,-illness,-etc.)/feel-pressure/feel-pain
